thread.title: Great location, great staff, great stay!
thread.title_full: Great location, great staff, great stay! - Review of Les Tournelles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jennifer T
title: Great location, great staff, great stay!
text: We loved this sweet little hotel in an ideal location in Paris. The 24 hour concierge service was excellent and so helpful. Breakfast was delightful and the honor bar located in the cozy lounge was most appreciated.From the hotel you can easily walk or pick up Velib, the Paris bike rental service that is a fantastic way to see the city.
